articles.title: U.S. warships transit Taiwan Strait, first since Pelosi visit

articles.title: System in central Atlantic Ocean organizing rapidly as forecasters monitor four tropical waves

articles.title: Thousands evacuated in India before implosion of giant skyscrapers
